option1.name: Week 6 Days 1-2: System Integration
option1.description: Integrate notification system with existing autonomous agent

rationale: Week 5 notification infrastructure is 100% complete and tested
All three notification modules (Email, Webhook, Content Engine) are operational
System integration is the logical next step before testing reliability
Integration will add notification triggers to existing Unity-Claude workflow
This follows the sequential implementation plan in the roadmap
expected_outcomes: Autonomous agent enhanced with real-time notification capabilities
Critical events will trigger email/webhook notifications automatically
Unattended 24/7 operation becomes feasible with proper alerting

immediate_tasks: Add notification trigger points to AutonomousAgent monitoring loop
Integrate with Unity compilation error detection
test_scenarios: Unity compilation error triggers email notification
Claude API failure sends webhook alert
System resource threshold triggers severity-based routing
Notification configuration can be updated dynamically

response: Based on comprehensive analysis of the implementation progress, Week 5 (Email/Webhook/Content Engine) is now 100% complete with all notification modules fully operational and tested. The next logical step in the Phase 2 implementation is Week 6 Days 1-2: System Integration (Hours 1-8). This phase will integrate the notification system with the existing Unity-Claude autonomous agent, adding notification triggers at critical workflow points including Unity compilation errors, Claude API/CLI failures, workflow state changes, system health alerts, and success notifications. All prerequisite modules are operational, making this the optimal time to proceed with system integration before moving to reliability testing. The integration will enable unattended 24/7 operation with proper alerting mechanisms. [RECOMMENDATION: TEST Week6-SystemIntegration]
